37.eng-name: The Book of Fighting [The Prohibition of Bloodshed]

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Jarir bin 'Abdullah said:"If a slave runs away to the land of Shirk, there is no protection (or immunity) for him

chapter.ara-name: باب الْعَبْدِ يَأْبَقُ إِلَى أَرْضِ الشِّرْكِ وَذِكْرِ اخْتِلاَفِ أَلْفَاظِ النَّاقِلِينَ لِخَبَرِ جَرِيرٍ فِي ذَلِكَ الاِخْتِلاَفِ عَلَى الشَّعْبِيِّ
chapter.eng-name: A Slave Who Runs Away to the Land of Shirk
